content: cute and little easy-to-make no-sew whale for a mini plush or keychain~ * the pattern is very easy to follow with notes and images to help * make this cute mini whale super quick and easy - in just 30 minutes or less * great for gifts and/or markets * do not reproduce the pattern or any part of it and give or sell it as your own * when selling makes created with this pattern proper credit pattern by xoohbie copyrights remain with the designer reminder it s a good practice to read through the full pattern first before going in and starting thanks so much for your support =============== **abbreviations** flo = front loop only fo = fasten_off magic_ring = magic_ring bbl = bobble chain = chain double_crochet = double_crochet decrease = decrease half_double_crochet = half_double_crochet increase = increase inv = invisible repeat = repeat single_crochet = single_crochet slip_stitch = slip_stitch st = stitch sts = stitches =============== **materials** **yarns** white for belly bulky blue or any base color you like bulky pink for blush bulky **hooks** 8mm hook - for chunky chenille blanket yarn jumbo 5 mm hook - for velvet yarn bulky 2 mm hook - for milk cotton yarn light worsted **needles** darning needle **accessories** safety eyes keychain fiber fill **tools** pliers for adding keychains soldering kit for keeping keychains in place optional =============== **finished size** **body diameter ** 5 jumbo chunky chenille blanket yarn w/ 8mm hook 3 bulky velvet yarn w/ 5mm hook 1 5 light worsted 5-ply milk cotton yarn w/ 2mm hook
